item.title: Firmware Upgrade on the PCEngines APU2
item.description: I’ve had a PCEngines APU2 gathering dust for a few years, and have recently decided to dust it off. Since the last time the device has been powered on, there have been many great improvements to the firmware, and it was very-much due for an upgrade. The following steps outline how the the firmware was upgrade on the APU directly from the already-installed operating system – CentOS. First, we will connect to the device over the serial port
